name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy fried wings tossed in your choice of sauce (BBQ, Hot, Jerk).

name: Chicken Drumsticks
description: Slow-roasted and glazed, perfect for starting a meal.

name: Suya
description: Spicy grilled beef skewers, a classic Nigerian street food.

name: Fried Shrimp
description: Golden crispy shrimp served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.

name: Sliders
description: Mini burgers with cheese, pickles, and our special sauce.

name: Garlic Bread/Rolls
description: Toasted and buttered with garlic and herbs.

name: Meatballs
description: *NEW* A perfect party starter. Tender meatballs in a tangy glaze.

name: Stew Chicken
description: Fall-off-the-bone chicken stewed in a rich, savory tomato broth.

name: Jerk Chicken
description: Authentic, spicy, and smoky grilled jerk chicken.

name: Shawarma (Chicken)
description: Thinly sliced, marinated chicken. (Wraps or as a platter).

name: Salmon (Grilled or Blackened)
description: A full salmon fillet, grilled to perfection or blackened with spices.

name: Steak Tips
description: Tender beef steak tips in a savory mushroom and onion gravy.

name: Braised Oxtail
description: *NEW* Rich, tender oxtail slow-cooked in a deep gravy.

name: Jollof Rice
description: Classic smoky West African jollof rice. A crowd favorite.

name: Fried Rice
description: Classic fried rice with mixed vegetables, egg, and your choice of protein.

name: Rice & Peas
description: Traditional Caribbean rice and peas cooked with coconut milk.

name: Rasta Pasta
description: Creamy pasta with bell peppers and jerk spices. Add chicken or shrimp.

name: Cajun Pasta
description: A creamy, spicy pasta with sausage, shrimp, and Cajun seasoning.

name: Alfredo Pasta
description: Rich and creamy parmesan and garlic sauce. Add chicken or shrimp.

name: Spaghetti (with Meat Sauce)
description: Classic spaghetti with a rich, slow-cooked beef meat sauce.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Ziti pasta baked with marinara, ricotta, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, beef, and cheese, baked to perfection.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: A fresh, vibrant pasta with basil pesto. Add chicken for an extra charge.

name: Mac and Cheese
description: Our famous baked mac and cheese, creamy and delicious.

name: Sweet Yams
description: Candied sweet yams, a sweet and savory delight.

name: Plantains
description: Sweet, fried plantains, perfectly caramelized.

name: Coleslaw
description: Creamy, crunchy, and cool coleslaw.

name: Steamed Cabbage
description: Tender steamed cabbage with carrots and onions.

name: Mashed Potatoes
description: Creamy, buttery garlic mashed potatoes.

name: Fruit Tray
description: A fresh assortment of seasonal fruits.

name: Collard Greens
description: *NEW* Slow-cooked, savory collard greens (with or without turkey).

name: Cornbread
description: Sweet and savory, baked fresh. Served by the piece or half-pan.

name: Banana Pudding
description: Classic, creamy, old-fashioned banana pudding with Nilla wafers.

name: Levain Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Thick, gooey, and loaded with chocolate chips.

name: Cake
description: Ask about our cake of the day (e.g., Red Velvet, Chocolate).

name: Brownies
description: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownies.

name: Cheesecake Slice
description: *NEW* Creamy New York style cheesecake with a strawberry topping.
